explains: adj. 露天的；户外的，野外的

sentences.en: Kamal was a vendor in Cairo's open-air bazaar.
sentences.cn: 卡莫尔曾是开罗露天集市的摊贩。

sentences.en: He caught a chill while performing at a rain-soaked open-air venue.
sentences.cn: 他在一个被雨浸湿的露天场地表演时着了风寒。

sentences.en: We sleep out under the stars, and eat our meals in the open air.
sentences.cn: 我们露宿在星空下，在户外用餐。
